title: Attack of the clones
body:
I just wanted to draw everyone's attention to some AWESOME blogs that I found online today. They all share a similar theme, but I bet you can't guess what it is...

+ Cool Blog 1
+ Cool Blog 2
+ Cool Blog 3

Weren't those great? I really like the design they're using... I wonder if I can make my blog look like that? Sigh. If only. I e-mailed the owner of Cool Blog 3 and told him what an AWESOME site he had. I love cheap imitations.

If you're considering ripping off my blog design, would you at least take the time to remove the [ about ] blurb. It took me a long time to write that blurb, and I hate seeing it trotted all over the net like some kind of cyberspace hussy. We can't ALL be intending to chronicle the process of developing, financing, starting, and maintaining a small, independently-owned, art-house theater, of which the majority of the names, of both people and places, are fictitious.

Since we're on the subject of shameless hacks, I'd like to point out another blatant copy of this site - urlgreen. This site, unlike the ones listed above, was built in jest by my good friend Rex. If you look closely, you'll notice that he's replaced key words to make me look like a complete idiot, which, surprising, isn't all too difficult. Well, that's all I wanted to say. I feel better now.

[ Update 07.16.04 @ 10:28 am ] - I think the owner of Cool Blog 3 had a change of heart and decided to take his site down. He wrote me an e-mail stating that "imitation was the sincerest form of flattery," to which I should have responded with "yes, but stealing my HTML/CSS code is the sincerest form of taking a crap on all the hard hours I put into creating a unique looking site." Instead, I responded with "I suppose," which is short for "I suppose... ass!" Either way, Cool Blog 3 is down, but for how long? We'll just have to wait and see what design he's using once he resurfaces.

[ Update 07.26.04 @ 05:58 pm ] - Yet another Cool Blog to add to the list. I'm the only one who's keeping track at this point, but that's okay. At least this guy switched the color scheme.

[ Update 08.04.04 @ 10:43 pm ] - When will end! Yet another blog has succumbed to the lure of this blog's whorish design.

[ Update 08.04.04 @ 10:48 pm ] -Here's an interesting take on my design. At least they altered it to fit their needs... although, the "comment" button is a direct link back here. Hmmm.
author: Dan
